description:
Set palette on a cifti file.

NOTE: The output file must be a different file than the input file.

For scalar maps, by default the palette is changed for every map, specify -column to change only one map.  Palette settings not specified will be taken from the first column for scalar maps, and from the existing file palette for other mapping types.  The <mode> argument must be one of the following:

MODE_AUTO_SCALE
MODE_AUTO_SCALE_ABSOLUTE_PERCENTAGE
MODE_AUTO_SCALE_PERCENTAGE
MODE_USER_SCALE

The <name> argument to -palette-name must be one of the following:

ROY-BIG-BL
videen_style
Gray_Interp_Positive
Gray_Interp
PSYCH-FIXED
RBGYR20
RBGYR20P
RYGBR4_positive
RGRBR_mirror90_pos
Orange-Yellow
POS_NEG_ZERO
red-yellow
blue-lightblue
FSL
power_surf
black-red
black-green
black-blue
black-red-positive
black-green-positive
black-blue-positive
blue-black-green
blue-black-red
red-black-green
fsl_red
fsl_green
fsl_blue
fsl_yellow
RedWhiteBlue
cool-warm
spectral
RY-BC-BL
magma
JET256
PSYCH
PSYCH-NO-NONE
ROY-BIG
clear_brain
fidl
raich4_clrmid
raich6_clrmid
HSB8_clrmid
POS_NEG
Special-RGB-Volume

The <type> argument to -thresholding must be one of the following:

THRESHOLD_TYPE_OFF
THRESHOLD_TYPE_NORMAL
THRESHOLD_TYPE_FILE

The <test> argument to -thresholding must be one of the following:

THRESHOLD_TEST_SHOW_OUTSIDE
THRESHOLD_TEST_SHOW_INSIDE

The <type> argument to -inversion must be one of the following:

OFF
POSITIVE_WITH_NEGATIVE
POSITIVE_NEGATIVE_SEPARATE

opt_column_column.title: opt_column_column
opt_column_column.description: select a single column for scalar maps: the column number or name

pos_min__.title: pos_min__
pos_min__.description: the percentile for the least positive data

pos_max__.title: pos_max__
pos_max__.description: the percentile for the most positive data

anyOf.description: percentage min/max for positive data coloring

pos_percent.description: percentage min/max for positive data coloring

neg_min__.title: neg_min__
neg_min__.description: the percentile for the least negative data

neg_max__.title: neg_max__
neg_max__.description: the percentile for the most negative data

anyOf.description: percentage min/max for negative data coloring

neg_percent.description: percentage min/max for negative data coloring

pos_min_user.title: pos_min_user
pos_min_user.description: the value for the least positive data

pos_max_user.title: pos_max_user
pos_max_user.description: the value for the most positive data

anyOf.description: user min/max values for positive data coloring

pos_user.description: user min/max values for positive data coloring

neg_min_user.title: neg_min_user
neg_min_user.description: the value for the least negative data

neg_max_user.title: neg_max_user
neg_max_user.description: the value for the most negative data

anyOf.description: user min/max values for negative data coloring

neg_user.description: user min/max values for negative data coloring

opt_interpolate_interpolate.title: opt_interpolate_interpolate
opt_interpolate_interpolate.description: interpolate colors: boolean, whether to interpolate

opt_disp_pos_display.title: opt_disp_pos_display
opt_disp_pos_display.description: display positive data: boolean, whether to display

opt_disp_neg_display.title: opt_disp_neg_display
opt_disp_neg_display.description: display positive data: boolean, whether to display

opt_disp_zero_display.title: opt_disp_zero_display
opt_disp_zero_display.description: display data closer to zero than the min cutoff: boolean, whether to display

opt_palette_name_name.title: opt_palette_name_name
opt_palette_name_name.description: set the palette used: the name of the palette

test.title: test
test.description: show values inside or outside thresholds

opt_inversion_type.title: opt_inversion_type
opt_inversion_type.description: specify palette inversion: the type of inversion
